law.text: Every person engaged in the business of operating taxicabs and required to be licensed under part 12 of this Code shall pay an annual license fee for each vehicle so operated in the amount of fifteen dollars ($15.00) in addition to the sum required by ยง2-2071. No license shall be issued under this section until an application for an owner's permit has been made pursuant to part 12 of this Code and until such permit has been issued. (Ord.
